known_issues: Live site shows Caffeine placeholder ('Publish or restore your Caffeine app...') indicating the production/live publish did not complete or the live canister is empty; requires restoring/re-publishing live build.

existing_features.title: Restore/re-publish the current working draft build (Version 6) to the production/live canister so that the live URL serves the Valentine app instead of the Caffeine placeholder screen (“Publish or restore your Caffeine app to make it appear here.”).
After the live publish completes, verify the production HTML metadata matches the current frontend build (title/description/canonical/og:url) and is not reverting to older cached content.

projectName: Restore production/live deployment so the live URL loads the app (not the Caffeine placeholder)
